channel.title: [317]Can't Trade![317]
channel.description: Ok so I really need help with my server. I am the Owner and I can't trade my players or my staff. How can I change this?

item.title: [317]Can't Trade![317]
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:3, topic:376641”][quote author=Sir Jay link=topic=472566.msg3456082#msg3456082 date=1294036204]
Does it give a sendmessage that you can look up… Just lookup sending trade request or something and then find the statement where it is stopping you from trading… I.E
if (playerRights > 1) {
return;
}
[/quote]
He said hes Owner , which means hes playerRights >= 3.

@Topic; whats your base?[/quote]

playerRights > 1 means if the players rights are greater than one, and 3 is greater than one -.-

On topic though, you want to be going in your client.java and near where your trading is handled it should say something like

if playerRights >= # {
return;
}

You just need to delete that part, some sources have it in because they do not want mods to be picking up items and trading them, however the pickup command should always be rights 3 imo.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Can't Trade![317]
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Just do what I do, give yourself mod to trade your players.
